name: EX Drones DEMO 1.0
description:
HEY Y'ALL! IT'S BEEN A LONG TIME,WE WERE WORKING FOR SO LONG THE DEMO VERSION OF EX Drones AND HERE IT IS! THE MOST WORK THAT WE DONE IS FIXING THE MECHANICS AND THE BUGS,AND OF COURSE ADDING NEW LEVELS PLUS WE ADDED MORE CHAOS HA?

EX Drones Is An Fps- Adventure Sci-FY, the game is beta and you may notice some bugs, please report them to fix them, we will updating the game as fast as we can.

WHAT DOES EX DRONES DEMO 1.0 INCLUDES?

-QUIT GAME BUTTON IS NOW ADDED ON THE PAUSE MENU

-NEW LEVELS ADDED

-MORE ENEMIES ADDED

-SOME BUGS ARE FIXED

-TEXTURES ARE UPGRADED

-SMOOTH  GAMEPLAY

-WHEN YOU LOSE YOU CAN RAGE QUIT BY PRESSING 'RAGE QUIT' BUTTON ON THE LOSE SCENE

-MORE OBJECTIVES  ADDED

THAT'S ALL 

 THANKS FOR PLAYING EX DRONES DEMO 1.0!
